alert.note: Alert for Roberts (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 6:50PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Big Stone and south central Roberts Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 749 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm over Beardsley, or near Browns Valley, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. Cold air funnels. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Yankeetown, Bonanza Grove and Big Stone Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Conditions are favorable for the development of weak, brief funnel clouds. This type of funnel cloud is harmless, but on rare occasions they can briefly touch down, producing wind gusts over 50 mph. If a funnel cloud is spotted move indoors and report your sighting to the National Weather Service.
